casebody.data:
SAWYERS
v.
FARM BUREAU INSURANCE. No. 264A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2005. Harold C. Spears, C. Grainger Pierce, Jr., Charlotte, for Farm Bureau Insurance.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of August 2005 by Plaintiff for extension of time to file new brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Michelle L. Sawyers) shall have up to and including the 19th day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2005."
